column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Quang - Thanks for your great review. And I'm especially glad we were able to change your opinion about bamboo shoots -- that doesn't happen very often
column2: so it's always nice to hear when something works in our favor. Also
column5: we are required to keep our lighting low and our music loud. JINYA Ramen Bar is geared specifically for a younger clientele
column6: though we obviously welcome everyone. And to be perfectly honest
column7: a quick look at our Yelp page and you'll find more than 2
